com.communote.server.core.database.hibernate

Class C3P0DataSourceConnectionProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.database.hibernate.C3P0DataSourceConnectionProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hibernate.connection.ConnectionProvider

    public class C3P0DataSourceConnectionProvider
extends Object
implements org.hibernate.connection.ConnectionProvider
    Connection Provider which uses a c3p0 pooled DataSource.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • createDataSource

        protected DataSource createDataSource()
                               throws SQLException,
                                      PropertyVetoException
        Create the DataSource from which the connections should be retrieved. This implementation creates and configures a c3p0 pooled DataSource which is passed to postDataSourceCreation(DataSource). The result of that method will be returned.
        Returns:
        the data source
        Throws:
        SQLException - in case of an error
        PropertyVetoException - in case of an error

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
                         throws SQLException
        Specified by:
        getConnection in interface org.hibernate.connection.ConnectionProvider
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getDataSource

        protected DataSource getDataSource()
                            throws SQLException
        Get the datasource for the client
        Returns:
        the datasource
        Throws:
        SQLException - in case the datasource could not be created

      • postDataSourceCreation

        protected DataSource postDataSourceCreation(DataSource dataSource)
        Method that is called after DataSource creation to allow further modifications of the DataSource. The default implementation will wrap the DataSource into a LazyConnectionDataSourceProxy.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the DataSource that was just created
        Returns:
        the final, lazily connecting DataSource

      • supportsAggressiveRelease

        public boolean supportsAggressiveRelease()
        Specified by:
        supportsAggressiveRelease in interface org.hibernate.connection.ConnectionProvider
